actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that employers resume normal business travel and tourism-related businesses intensify efforts to promote travel both to and within the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that employers resume normal business travel that was suspended during the Persian Gulf War and that travel and tourism-related businesses intensify efforts to promote travel both to and within the United States.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that employers resume normal business travel and tourism-related businesses intensify efforts to promote travel both to and within the United States.
